node.title: They Wanted a Balcony in Brooklyn on a Budget. Which Option Would You Choose?
node.alt: For their new apartment in central Brooklyn, Elisa Odoardi and Seamus Mullin wanted some outdoor space for a garden, enough room for a dining table and a kitchen with a dishwasher. Their budget was $525,000.
node.description: A young couple searched Midwood and Kensington for a one-bedroom with enough outdoor space to have a small garden — and maybe a dishwasher in the kitchen. Here’s what they found.
